attributes.action: scrap the 2012 Olympic Games logo and have a new one designed, without the £400,000 expense.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is Britain a country of overspending? Not only have the Olympic Games drained the economy, we've now spend £400,000 on a Logo which resembles David Brent from The Office. If you agree that the PM should intervene and allow the country not to be ridiculed during the Olympics, insisting on a new and improved logo (very much like one suggested by a BBC News website reader -http://newsimg.bbc.co.uk/media/images/43006000/jpg/_43006855_james_wren_416.jpg) then please sign this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
